summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road in rainy conditions. The vehicle ahead is a white sedan. The self-driving vehicle is gradually decelerating from 52 km/h to 17 km/h over the 10 seconds. A motorcycle appears on the left side and falls onto the road, causing a potential hazard.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is decelerating due to the wet road conditions and the presence of a fallen motorcycle on the left side of the road. The vehicles speed decreases from 52 km/h to 17 km/h over the 10 seconds, maintaining a safe distance from the white sedan ahead.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Left side: A motorcycle, approximately 5 meters away, fallen onto the road, causing a potential hazard.
